articles.author: Peter Sblendorio
articles.description: The “Idol” judges were visibly concerned, with Katy Perry putting her hands up to her head, and Richie and Luke Bryan rushing over to the contestant.
articles.title: ‘American Idol’ contestant faints after audition and is hospitalized - New York Daily News

articles.author: Chauncey Alcorn, CNN Business
articles.description: After mass shootings in Boulder and Atlanta that killed 18 people in the span of a single week, lawmakers are once again calling for stricter gun regulation in America. The gun industry is already preparing for a surge of sales.
articles.title: Gun industry prepares for a surge in demand after back-to-back mass shootings - CNN

articles.author: AFP
articles.content:

articles.content:
US President Joe Biden is facing off against the powerful American gun lobby after calling for stronger laws in the wake of the latest mass shooting in Colorado.

articles.description: The pro-gun lobby had called on members to "celebrate" a ban being struck down in Boulder just a week before a mass shooting which killed 10 people in the city.
articles.title: Joe Biden takes on America's powerful gun lobby in the aftermath of the Colorado mass shooting - SBS News
